text.tspan: Age dependency breakdown by young and old dependents, World, 1960 to
Age dependency ratio is the ratio of dependents (either children aged 0-14 years, or older populations aged over 64 years) to
the working age population (15-64 years). Data shows the relative composition of the dependent population between young and
Source: World Bank based on data from the UN Population Division
